translation.en: Are you gonna throw up? Do you want me to pull over?
Shouldn't I be over morning sickness by now?
translation.it: Non dovrei aver finito con le nausee mattutine?

translation.en: I mean, every woman's body is different, right?
translation.it: Il corpo di ogni donna è diverso, no?

translation.en: Oh, yeah? What do you know about women's bodies?
translation.it: E tu che ne sai dei corpi delle donne?
- Siamo a metà strada per San Diego. - Lo so.

translation.en: [sighs] It's just been hard to know for sure.
Dad must think I'm an idiot.
[sighs] Look, Beck, I know it's not in your nature to put yourself first,
translation.it: Senti, Beck, so che non è da te metterti al primo posto,

translation.en: but in this case, I don't think you should take Mom and Dad's feelings into account.
translation.it: ma stavolta, non devi tenere conto dei sentimenti di mamma e papà.

translation.en: I don't think you should take my feelings into account. I don't think you should even take the baby's needs into account.
translation.it: E nemmeno dei miei. E neanche dei bisogni del bambino.

translation.en: Guess I'll have another 1,500 miles to decide, right?
translation.it: Avrò altri 2.400 km per decidere, giusto?

translation.en: -Let's just get back on the road and... -[boy] Help!
-...not worry about any of this. -Did you hear that?
translation.it: - e non preoccuparti di niente. - Hai sentito?

translation.en: Sounds like he's really in trouble.
[boy] I've been trying to get to the road, -but I can't find it! -[sighs]
translation.it: Ho provato ad arrivare alla strada, ma non riesco a trovarla!

translation.en: Careful. Don't slide down into that ditch.
Watch your arm. I'm gonna pull this thing off the side of the road.
translation.it: Occhio al braccio. Sposto l'auto da qui.

translation.en: Hey, kid, can you hear me?
I've been stuck in here for days!
There's a woman in there with him. She's being weird.
translation.it: C'è una donna con lui. È strana.

translation.en: Kid, you're right next to us. Can you see the road?
translation.it: Sei proprio vicino a noi. Non vedi la strada?

translation.en: -[Tobin] Yes! Please hurry! -[voice recording] Emergency services.
translation.it: - Sì! Ti prego, fai presto. - Emergenze.

translation.en: -Please stay on the line. -[Tobin] I'm tired!
[Cal] Okay, Tobin, listen to me. Just sit tight. We're gonna come to you.
translation.it: - Ok, Tobin. Stai fermo. Veniamo da te. - La sua posizione?

translation.en: [Becky] I don't know the town name, but there's a kid lost in the grass.
translation.it: Non so il nome della città, ma c'è un bambino perso nell'erba.

translation.en: I lost the 911 chick. Is your phone working?
translation.it: È caduta la linea. Il tuo telefono funziona?

translation.en: No, I left my phone in the car.
translation.it: No, ho lasciato il telefono in auto.

translation.en: Please, keep coming. I can't find you.
translation.it: Ti prego, continua. Non riesco a trovarti.

translation.en: Kid, you sound like you're headed for Nebraska. Stay still!
translation.it: Sembra che tu stia andando in Nebraska. Stai fermo!

translation.en: I don't care how scared you are, don't move. Let us come to you.
translation.it: Non importa se hai paura, non muoverti. Veniamo da te.

translation.en: Becky, where the hell are you?
Something's not right about this. I think we should head back to the road.
translation.it: C'è qualcosa che non va. Dovremmo tornare alla strada.

translation.en: What about the kid and his mom?
translation.it: E il ragazzo e sua madre?

translation.en: Let's just get back together first.
I'll keep talking and you work your way back towards me, okay?
translation.it: Continuerò a parlare e tu verrai verso di me, ok?

translation.en: [Becky] What do you talk about when you're lost in a field?
translation.it: Di cosa parli quando ti perdi in un campo?

translation.en: [Cal] Thousands of miles of gabbing, and you can't think of anything to say?
translation.it: Hai parlato per chilometri e ora non sai cosa dire?

translation.en: There once was a guy named McSweeney
Who spilled some gin on his weenie
Just to be couth, he added vermouth
translation.it: Li mandarono giù e ne vollero di più

translation.en: And slipped his girl a martini
[Tobin] Hey, you guys, are you looking for me? I'm scared!
translation.it: Ehi, ragazzi, mi state cercando? Ho paura!

translation.en: There once was a woman named Jill
They found her vagina in North Carolina--
translation.it: La sua vagina arrivò fino in Cina e..."

translation.en: Aah! Stop, stop. I overshot you somehow.
translation.it: Basta. Non so come ma ti ho superata.

translation.en: [Becky] Cal, quit fucking around. This isn't funny.
translation.it: Cal, non scherzare. Non è divertente.

translation.en: You're right, there's something wrong here.
translation.it: Hai ragione, c'è qualcosa che non va.

translation.en: All right, let's just do this.
On the count of three, we both jump with our hands raised in the air.
translation.it: Al tre, saltiamo con le mani alzate in aria.

translation.en: [Becky] Yeah, of course I can jump. What do you think?
translation.it: Certo che posso saltare. Cosa credi?

translation.en: I think you're gonna have a baby this summer, that's what I think.
translation.it: Che quest'estate avrai un bambino, ecco cosa credo.

translation.en: [Becky] Yeah. Yeah, you did. You must have! You still are.
translation.it: Sì, l'hai fatto. Devi averlo fatto! Lo hai fatto ancora.

translation.en: I'm not. I swear I'm not.
Forget it. Let's just do this.
This is nuts! This is fucking nuts!
[Becky] Cal? Are you okay? What is it?
I'm getting a little freaked out here.
[groans] We're gonna get out of here.
We just need to keep our heads.

translation.it: - E il ragazzo? - Lascia stare il ragazzo.

translation.en: [Cal] Beck, just stay where you are, okay? Don't move.
translation.it: Senti, resta dove sei, ok? Non muoverti.

translation.en: It's okay, Cal. This is Tobin's daddy.
translation.it: Va tutto bene, Cal. Sono il papà di Tobin.

translation.en: If you wanna get out of here, come with me.
translation.it: Se vuoi uscire di qui, vieni con me.

translation.en: If you could get out, why are you still in?
translation.it: Se puoi uscire, perché sei ancora qui?

translation.en: I'm looking for my boy and my wife. They're lost in here, too.
translation.it: Cerco mio figlio e mia moglie. Anche loro si sono persi qui.

translation.en: Look, it's gonna be dark soon. We should stick together.
translation.it: Senti, presto farà buio. Meglio restare uniti.

translation.en: I understand. You don't know me from Adam.
translation.it: Lo capisco. Tu non mi conosci.

translation.en: Ross Humbolt's the name. Real estate's the game. [chuckles]
translation.it: Mi chiamo Ross Humboldt, agente immobiliare.
Vengo da Poughkeepsie, cerco Natalie e Tobin.

translation.en: Not like walking a straight line, though. Nothing is around here.
translation.it: Non è come camminare su una linea retta. Niente lo è, qui.

translation.en: Just follow me, but stay close.
Whatever you do, don't lose sight of me, okay?
translation.it: L'importante è non perdermi di vista, ok?

translation.en: Hang tight, Cal. We're coming for ya.
But it's easier once they're dead.
translation.it: Ma è più facile se sono morte.

translation.en: The field doesn't move dead things around.
translation.it: Il campo non muove le cose morte.

translation.en: did you lure us in here?
How long have you been in here?
How do you know she's my sister?
translation.it: Come sai che è mia sorella?

translation.en: The rock teaches you to hear the tall grass.
translation.it: La roccia ti insegna a sentire l'erba alta.

translation.en: you must know where she is.
I can find out for you.
I can do better than that.
Do you wanna check on her?
I remember when Natalie was pregnant.
Enjoy your baby, because it goes fast.
translation.it: Goditi il bambino, perché passa in fretta.

translation.en: If there's one thing I know for certain,
translation.it: Se c'è una cosa che so per certo,

translation.en: The sooner we get to them, the better.
You'll never find her that way.
I'm trying to find these two.
[man on radio] ...south breezes today, we've certainly been warming up.
translation.it: ...brezza dal sud, oggi, e fa più caldo.

translation.en: That is about to change as another cold front moves in late tonight into the morning.
translation.it: Ma da stasera ci sarà un fronte freddo fino a domattina.

translation.en: Ahead of that, clouds increase tonight.
Humidity level creeps up just a little bit,
and that helps to kind of set the stage for some drizzle, possibly,
translation.it: forse si prepara un po' di pioggia per martedì,

translation.en: across especially eastern and southeastern counties for your Tuesday.
translation.it: specialmente sulle contee orientali e sudorientali.

translation.en: But much cooler weather. It's not gonna be cool.
translation.it: Ma il tempo sarà più fresco. Non farà freddo.

translation.en: Considering this time of year, abnormally cool.
translation.it: Per questo periodo, sarà eccezionalmente fresco.

translation.en: The people who are stuck in here.
But they're not connected to us, so... doesn't matter.
translation.it: Ma non sono connesse con noi, quindi non importa.

translation.en: -Look, kid, we've never met before. I'm-- -Travis.
translation.it: - Non ci siamo mai visti. Io sono... - Travis.

translation.en: How do you know my name? You're looking for Becky.
translation.it: - Come lo sai? - Stai cercando Becky.

translation.en: Wait, how's that even... Who the hell are you?
Look, do you know where she is?
Look at me! Where is she?
-Are you sure you wanna see her? -Of course! Just...
translation.it: - Sicuro di volerla vedere? - Certo! Solo...

translation.en: [Tobin] The field doesn't move dead things.
translation.it: Il campo non muove le cose morte.

translation.en: It makes them easier to find.
[sobbing] Oh, my God. Oh, my God, oh, my...
-Hello! -[Ross] Tobin, keep an eye on Freddy.
What, you... you don't remember me now?
translation.it: Come, non ti ricordi più di me?

translation.en: Over there, Mommy. Do you hear him?

translation.it: - Tutto ok, Freddy. Fermo. - Dove sei? Aiuto!

translation.en: -Get out! Get somebody. -We'll close when I get back next week. Okay?
translation.it: Firmiamo quando torno, la settimana prossima, ok?

translation.en: -No. No, no, no. I'm telling you. -[Tobin] Freddy!
translation.it: - No, te lo sto dicendo. - Freddy!

translation.en: Don't back out of escrow. -You're not overpaying. -Tobin! Damn it!
translation.it: Non tirarti indietro, ok? È un buon prezzo.

translation.en: [Ross] Toby, stay close. Don't go in there, it's private property.
translation.it: Toby, resta qui. Non entrare, è proprietà privata.

translation.en: [Ross] Toby, don't worry about Freddy. Just come back to us.
translation.it: Toby, non pensare a Freddy. Torna qui.

translation.en: If you're still outside the grass, don't come back in here!
translation.it: Se sei ancora fuori dall'erba, non tornare qui!

translation.en: [Ross] Tobin Humbolt, didn't you hear your mother? Come back here!
translation.it: Tobin Humbolt, non hai sentito tua madre? Torna qui!

translation.en: [Natalie] Honey, can you see him? -Where is he? -[Tobin] Over here!
translation.it: - Tesoro, lo vedi? Dov'è? - Sono qua!

translation.en: -[Ross] Sounds like he's in front of us. -Are you Tobin's dad?
translation.it: - Sembra di fronte a noi. - Sei il padre di Tobin?

translation.en: [Ross] Yeah. Who are you? What's going on?
-Don't come in here! -[Ross] Little late for that, buddy.
translation.it: - Non entrate qui! - Un po' tardi, amico.

translation.en: That guy, though, I'm not so sure about.
Toby, don't let that man get near you, okay? Don't talk to him. If you see him, you run.
translation.it: Toby, non far avvicinare quell'uomo. Non parlargli. Se lo vedi, scappa!

translation.en: [Natalie] Did you hear that? He went right by us.
translation.it: Hai sentito? Ci è passato vicino.

translation.en: Okay. Okay, Rossy boy. Hold it together.
Stay positive. That's what's gonna get you out of this.
translation.it: Resta ottimista. È il modo per uscirne.

translation.en: It's gonna get you out of this.
"Mind that's light sells right." Right? "The mind that's light sells right."
Right? "The mind that's light sells right. The mind that's light sells right.
Fuck. This fucking kid. Fucking kid.
Maybe if your mother acted like a mother for once, kept an eye on you.
translation.it: Se per una volta tua madre avesse fatto la madre, tenendoti d'occhio.

translation.en: - I'm lost in here! -[Becky] Sounds like he's in trouble.
translation.it: - Mi sono perso. - Sembra davvero nei guai.

translation.en: -I've been trying to get to the road... -[Cal sighs] ...but I can't find it!
translation.it: Ho provato ad arrivare alla strada, ma non riesco a trovarla!

translation.en: [Cal] Careful. Don't slide down into that ditch.
Watch your arm. I'm gonna pull this thing off the side of the road.
translation.it: Occhio al braccio. Sposto l'auto da qui.

translation.en: [Becky at a distance] There once was a man named McSweeney
Who spilled some gin on his weenie
Just to be couth, he added vermouth
translation.it: Li mandarono giù e ne vollero di più

translation.en: And slipped his girl a martini
[Tobin] Hey, you guys, are you looking for me? I'm scared!
translation.it: Ehi, ragazzi, mi state cercando? Ho paura!

translation.en: [Becky] There once was a woman named Jill...
translation.it: - "C'era una donna di nome Iva... - Becky?

translation.en: They found her vagina in North Carolina--
translation.it: La sua vagina arrivò fino in Cina...

translation.en: [Becky] How... How the hell did you get here?
[Travis] I don't know, but I'm here.
translation.it: Non lo so, ma sono qui.

translation.en: Why? Why the fuck are you here?
But how did you get here before us?
translation.it: Ma come hai fatto ad arrivare prima di noi?

translation.en: [Travis] I don't know. But it doesn't matter now.
translation.it: Non saprei. Ma ora non ha importanza.

translation.en: Okay, just stay where you are.
Do you hear that? Becky? Cal?
Yeah, but we already tried that.
translation.it: Sì, ma ci abbiamo già provato.

translation.en: [Travis] Well, this time, I think it might.

translation.it: Seguite la voce di Tobin, ok?
- Sì, proprio così. - E va bene.

translation.en: There once was a man named McSweeney
Who spilled some gin on his weenie?
He put something on his weenie
Uh... And then slipped his girl a martini?
translation.it: e poi si scolarono un Martini?"

translation.en: And that's a dirty rhyme, not for kids.
translation.it: È una filastrocca da ubriaconi, non è per bambini.

translation.en: What the fuck is going on?
Name one thing in here that does.
So, explain to us again how you got here.
translation.it: Spiegaci di nuovo come sei arrivato qui.

translation.en: You must have been right on our asses the whole way.
translation.it: Ci sarai stato con il fiato sul collo.

translation.en: Oh, no, no. I came after.
you didn't show up in San Diego.
translation.it: Non siete andati a San Diego.

translation.en: We just left two days ago.
translation.it: Siamo partiti solo due giorni fa.

translation.en: No, it was longer than that. It was more like... two months.
translation.it: No, non due giorni. Direi più... due mesi.

translation.en: Now, that really doesn't make any sense.
I think we have to focus on how the hell we get out.
translation.it: Dobbiamo capire come uscire da qui.

translation.en: Well, I'm not making Becky blindly walk through Wonderland anymore.
translation.it: Non lascerò Becky vagare ancora nel Paese delle Meraviglie.

translation.en: -We need some kind of plan. -Well, we can't just sit here.
translation.it: - Serve un piano. - Non possiamo restare fermi.

translation.en: -I think we have to get moving. -[Becky] Yeah.
No, I agree. Let's just go.

translation.it: - In quale direzione? - Non lo so!

translation.en: The point is I don't want to stay here.
Do you see anything other than grass?
translation.it: Vedi altro che non sia erba?

translation.en: No, I can't tell. It's too far away.
translation.it: No, non lo so. È troppo lontano.
Ok, da che parte è? Di là.

translation.en: [Cal] So, you saw our car at the church and you didn't call anybody?
translation.it: Hai visto la nostra auto dalla chiesa e non hai chiamato nessuno?

translation.en: I don't suppose you, um, told anyone where you were headed, did you?
translation.it: Immagino che non avrai detto a nessuno dove stavi andando, vero?

translation.en: Not that it'll make much difference.
What could they do? You ask me, I don't think anyone's coming.
translation.it: Cosa potrebbero fare? Penso che non verrà nessuno.

translation.en: everyone thought I was crazy for trying.
Yeah. It's been a while since I checked.
translation.it: È da un po' che non controllo.

translation.en: Didn't wanna wait to find out.
translation.it: Già. Non volevo aspettare per saperlo.

translation.en: Ginny is what I'm calling her.
For now, anyways, after my great aunt Virginia.
translation.it: Per ora, in ogni caso, come la mia prozia Virginia.

translation.en: Lively is the word for it.
[Becky over phone] Don't let Cal hurt Travis!
translation.it: Non lasciare che Cal faccia del male a Travis!

translation.en: Or else we're gonna keep making the same mistake!
translation.it: Altrimenti continueremo a fare lo stesso errore!

translation.en: One more reason to keep moving.
Hey! Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait!

translation.it: Oh, Grazie a Dio sei qui.
- La bambina si muove. - Stai bene?

translation.en: It's probably just her condition and a touch of heatstroke. That's all.
translation.it: Sarà stata la sua condizione e... il caldo, tutto qua.
Tu sei Ross. Sei il padre di Tobin.

translation.en: Hey, don't worry. Your mother, she's out there.
translation.it: Ehi, non preoccuparti. Tua madre è là fuori.

translation.en: We're gonna find her, and then we're leaving.
translation.it: La troveremo e poi ce ne andremo.

translation.en: Yeah, I got to the road, but I wasn't gonna leave without my family.
translation.it: Sì, sono arrivato alla strada, ma senza la mia famiglia non me ne vado.

translation.en: Well, it's not a straight line. I can say that much.
translation.it: Beh, non è una linea retta. Posso dirlo.

translation.en: -Which way were you headed? -Towards that building.
translation.it: - Da che parte andavate? - Verso l'edificio.

translation.en: [Travis] All right, come on. Up on my shoulders, Tobin.
translation.it: Ok, dai, salimi sulle spalle, Tobin.

translation.en: [Ross] That's the way things work around here.
But I got the golden ticket, for any takers.
translation.it: Ma ho il biglietto vincente, per tutti.

translation.en: Let me guess. Lead singer in a band?
translation.it: Fammi indovinare. Cantante in una band?

translation.en: Four-piece, with a weekly gig at the local?
translation.it: In quattro, concerto settimanale in un locale?

translation.en: I'm a good judge of people. You gotta be, in my field.
translation.it: So giudicare le persone. È necessario, nel mio campo.

translation.en: We were on a little family vacay through the heartland.
translation.it: Eravamo in vacanza in famiglia nel centro del Paese.

translation.en: It was going pretty well till we ran into you.
I'm just giving you a hard time, that's all.
translation.it: Ti stavo solo prendendo in giro.

translation.en: I know it's not your fault.
translation.it: So che non è colpa tua.

translation.en: You know, believe it or not, before I ended up here, before, uh, real estate was my game,
translation.it: Che tu ci creda o no, prima di finire qui, prima di occuparmi di immobili,

translation.en: Me and my Gibson and Jesus were gonna rock the world.
translation.it: Io e la mia Gibson e Gesù avremmo conquistato il mondo.

translation.en: But, you know, got married and had a kid, and...
translation.it: Ma, sai, mi sono sposato, ho avuto un figlio e...

translation.en: Still, nothin', but nothin' compares to this.
translation.it: Comunque, non c'è nulla che sia paragonabile a questo.

translation.en: [Ross] Oh, I think it's a safe bet it's been here
since before the Kiowa hunted on the Osage Cuestas.
translation.it: da prima che i Kiowa cacciassero negli Osage Cuestas.

translation.en: Older than the hills. Probably was here before the glaciers came and carried the hills away.
translation.it: È vecchissima. Era qui prima che i ghiacciai trascinassero via i monti.

translation.en: You realize we're in the center of the contiguous United States.
translation.it: Ti rendi conto che siamo al centro degli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: Smack-dab in the middle of the continent.
Ah, hell, I'd hazard this stone...
is the center of the center.
We didn't come here for a goddamn sightseeing tour.
translation.it: Non siamo qui per una dannata visita guidata.

translation.en: You were gonna show us the way out.
Is there a map on it or something?
translation.it: C'è una mappa o qualcosa del genere?

translation.en: Just put your hand on it and you'll know.
translation.it: Mettici sopra la mano e lo saprai.

translation.en: -Thank God you're all right. -Stay away! Stay away from us!
translation.it: Grazie a Dio stai bene. Stammi lontano. Stai lontano da noi!

translation.en: Whatever he told you, whatever he said to you, he's lying!
translation.it: Qualsiasi cosa vi abbia detto, sta mentendo!

translation.en: What? What are you talking about?
All I know, all I care about, is that we're finally together.
translation.it: So solo che finalmente siamo insieme.

translation.en: Everything's gonna be all right now, honey.
She was what? Just say it.
[sobs] I saw her on the ground some ways back.
translation.it: L'ho vista per terra da qualche parte.

translation.en: Mommy's just a little confused right now.
translation.it: La mamma è solo un po' confusa.

translation.en: I saw her. I saw her, and you...
-How could you even think that? -[groans] We're all in this together.
translation.it: Come puoi pensarlo? Siamo tutti nella stessa barca.

translation.en: Look, thanks for your help, mister, but, uh...
I think we're gonna go our own way now...
Do you wanna come with us?
No, just a minute. Just hear me out.
once you touch it, you'll know.
It's... It's better than anything. It's like accepting the host.
translation.it: È meglio di qualsiasi altra cosa. È come mangiare un'ostia.

translation.en: I know that sounds like blasphemy, but it's true.
translation.it: So che sembra blasfemo, ma è vero.

translation.en: You think this is just chance?
Folks are brought into the grass for a reason.
translation.it: La gente finisce nell'erba per un motivo.

translation.en: We're all here because we've got stuff to work out.
translation.it: Siamo qui perché abbiamo delle cose da sistemare.

translation.en: And this rock, in its wisdom,
translation.it: E questa roccia, nella sua saggezza,

translation.en: brought our two families together to do just that.
translation.it: ha riunito le nostre famiglie proprio per questo.

translation.en: All it's asking for is a little faith.
translation.it: Chiede solo un po' di fiducia.

translation.en: Five little fingers on its face and you will be redeemed!
translation.it: Cinque dita sulla sua superficie e sarete tutti redenti.

translation.en: All your sins, all your trespasses, all your regrets will melt away
translation.it: Tutti i vostri peccati, le colpe, i rimorsi, saranno spazzati via

translation.en: and the world will open up like a flower!
translation.it: e il mondo si aprirà come un fiore!

translation.en: You gotta trust me on this.
I think you should let her go.
Look, you don't have the advantage here.
If you think I was doing the soft sell because I was afraid of going the other way,
translation.it: Se credi che stessi usando la persuasione per paura di fare diversamente,

translation.en: well, you got another think comin'.
It's better that you come to the rock on your own.
translation.it: È meglio se vieni alla roccia da solo.

translation.en: Open your heart to it, like I did.
translation.it: Aprile il tuo cuore, come ho fatto io.

translation.en: Now, what I really wanna know...
is how did you get here?
Because the rock wouldn't let you find us unless it wanted you to.
translation.it: La roccia non te lo avrebbe permesso, se non lo avesse voluto.
A meno che non si tratti di te.

translation.en: When you touch that rock, you'll know everything I know.
translation.it: Toccando quella roccia, sapresti tutto quello che so.

translation.en: Everything the grass knows, including how to leave.
translation.it: Tutto quello che sa l'erba, anche come andare via.
Solo che non lo vorrai fare.
E ogni carne è come l'erba.

translation.en: He's right, you know? Where are we gonna go?
He'll find us. For sure, he'll find us.
[Travis] Listen to me. First thing we have to do is you need to take hold of my hand.
translation.it: Ascoltami. Per prima cosa, afferra la mia mano, ok?
- È tutto ok, Tobin. - Mio padre ha ragione.
- È tutto ok, Tobin. - Mio padre ha ragione. Siamo erba.

translation.en: We keep dying and coming back.
-I didn't know what to do. -Yeah, you sure didn't.
translation.it: - Non sapevo cosa fare. - Già, si è visto.

translation.en: Well, we wouldn't be in this mess if it wasn't for you.
translation.it: Non saremmo nei guai se non fosse per te.

translation.en: Okay, blaming each other isn't gonna solve anything.
translation.it: Ok, incolparci a vicenda non risolverà niente.

translation.en: Well, all indicators are that there's no way to solve this.
translation.it: Tutti i segnali indicano che non c'è soluzione.

translation.en: If we're just gonna go round and round in circles,
translation.it: Se continueremo a girare in tondo,

translation.en: I'll feel a lot better saying what we all know.
translation.it: dire quello che sappiamo tutti mi farà stare meglio.

translation.en: Are you forgetting the detail that he completely abandoned you?
That he totally threw you away?
translation.it: Che si è liberato di te?

translation.en: That he wanted you to abort your own baby?
translation.it: Che voleva che abortissi il tuo bambino?

translation.en: -I just wanted... -You just wanted to what?
I need food. I need water. I need a place to sleep.
translation.it: Ho bisogno di cibo. Di acqua. Mi serve un posto dove dormire.

translation.en: What I don't need is any more brotherly love.
translation.it: Quello che non mi serve è altro amore fraterno.

translation.en: But that's not the real reason you don't like me.
translation.it: Ma non è il vero motivo per cui non ti piaccio.

translation.en: No, it's a good excuse, but it's not the reason.
translation.it: No, è una buona scusa, ma non è il motivo.

translation.en: You didn't want me around even before there was a baby.
translation.it: Non ti piacevo da prima che ci fosse un bambino.

translation.en: The truth is, there's nothing that I could have done to make you like me,
translation.it: La verità è che non avrei potuto fare niente per piacerti

translation.en: because no one is ever gonna be good enough for your little sister.
translation.it: perché nessuno è abbastanza per la tua sorellina.

translation.en: -A high school diploma would be nice. -You know what?
I'm not quite the fuckup that you think I am!
translation.it: Lo sai? Non sono il cazzone che pensi tu!

translation.en: Oh, no. No, no. You're a real rock star.
translation.it: Oh, no. Sei una vera rock star.

translation.en: You've sacrificed everything for that ridiculous, infantile fantasy,
translation.it: Hai sacrificato tutto per quella fantasia ridicola e infantile e ora ne soffriamo tutti.

translation.en: and now we're all suffering for it.
translation.it: ridicola e infantile e ora ne soffriamo tutti.

translation.en: Playing hubby to your little sister?
translation.it: Fai da marito alla tua sorellina?

translation.en: That's the next best thing to fucking her, which is what you really want, isn't it?
translation.it: È il meglio che ti resta, visto che non te la puoi scopare.

translation.en: He's not gonna get through that without a sledgehammer.
translation.it: Non ce la farà senza una mazza.

translation.en: I wouldn't be so sure about that.
What are we gonna do? We're stuck up here!
No, listen to me. When I drove here, I saw this building from the road.
translation.it: No, ascolta. Mentre venivo qui, ho visto questo edificio dalla strada.

translation.en: Yeah. The church, it was just on the other side.
translation.it: Già. La chiesa era proprio di fronte.

translation.en: Only thing is, we go in that grass again and we're back to square one.
translation.it: Il punto è che se rientriamo nell'erba siamo al punto di partenza.

translation.en: Fucking dog gives me the creeps.
translation.it: Cane del cazzo, mi dà i brividi.

translation.en: The way out? You think that's it?
Maybe. But we're not there yet--
translation.it: Forse. Ma non ci siamo ancora arriva...

translation.en: Becky, we've gotta get out of here.
Holes are everywhere, Calvin, my boy.
translation.it: I buchi sono ovunque, Calvin caro.

translation.en: I'll come back for him, but we have to get you out!
translation.it: Tornerò io, ma dobbiamo farti uscire!

translation.en: I found a way. It's... It's right there.
translation.it: Ho trovato un modo. È proprio lì.

translation.en: Beck, I'm your brother, and I'm telling you right now to forget about that asshole.
translation.it: Beck, sono tuo fratello e ti dico di dimenticare quello stronzo.

translation.en: Thought that you would lose your sister when you got out of here.
translation.it: Hai pensato che l'avresti persa, una volta fuori.

translation.en: That the baby would bring her and Travis together, you'd be left out in the cold.
translation.it: Che la bambina avrebbe riunito lei e Travis, lasciandoti solo.

translation.en: You're probably right on that score.
Your mistake is thinking you're ever leaving.
translation.it: Il tuo errore è pensare che te ne andrai.

translation.en: Of course, I was a bit of a track star back in the day.
translation.it: Ero un campione nella corsa, un tempo.

translation.en: -[screams] -[grunts] I know. I know. I know.
You're thinking if you had just turned left instead of right,
translation.it: Pensi che se avessi girato a sinistra invece che a destra,

translation.en: you could've gotten away from me.
And you kept running and didn't turn at all.
translation.it: Continuavi a correre e non giravi.

translation.en: in the garden of forking paths,
translation.it: nel giardino dei sentieri che si biforcano,

translation.en: you didn't make any one choice.
translation.it: non hai fatto una sola scelta.

translation.en: And they all led back to me.
I think he loves you a little too much.
translation.it: ...credo che ti ami un po' troppo.
Ma questo non è colpa sua.

translation.en: I had my chance with you, and I threw it away.
translation.it: Ho avuto la mia occasione con te e l'ho sprecata.

translation.en: I want you to know I...
I'm glad you didn't listen to me.
translation.it: ...sono felice che tu non mi abbia ascoltato,

translation.en: There's something I didn't tell you.
translation.it: ...una cosa che non ti ho detto.

translation.en: I was gonna give her up.
I didn't think I was ready to be a mom.
translation.it: Non mi sentivo pronta per fare la mamma.

translation.en: That's why we were, um, going to San Diego.
translation.it: Ecco perché stavamo andando a San Diego.

translation.en: What difference does it make now?
We're gonna get out of here.
I'm gonna find a way. Our baby deserves to live.
translation.it: Troverò il modo. La nostra bimba merita di vivere.

translation.en: I wish I could just touch your hand.
How funny. This is where I tussled with Natalie for the first time.
translation.it: È buffo, è qui che ho lottato con Natalie per la prima volta.

translation.en: I tried to show her the way, but she just wouldn't listen.
translation.it: Volevo mostrarle la via, ma non mi ascoltava.

translation.en: You wanna touch the rock, darlin'?
You wanna lay on it naked?
Beneath the pinwheel stars while the grass sings our names?
translation.it: Sotto girandole di stelle mentre l'erba canta i nostri nomi?

translation.en: but tears are better for an old, thirsty rock like that.
translation.it: ma le lacrime sono meglio per una vecchia roccia assetata.

translation.en: -It has to be quick, though. -[thunder rumbling]
Don't wanna do it in front of the kid.
translation.it: Non vorrai farlo davanti al bambino.
Non lasciare che Cal faccia del male a Travis!

translation.en: Or else we're gonna keep making the same mistakes forever.
translation.it: Altrimenti continueremo a fare gli stessi errori per sempre.

translation.en: -No, not too fast. -[gulps] I don't want you to get sick.
translation.it: No, non troppo in fretta. Non voglio che ti ammali.

translation.en: -May I have a look? My baby? -It's okay.
Out of the oven and baked just right.
Wonder when the Wise Men will come.
translation.it: Mi chiedo quando arriveranno i Magi.

translation.en: I wonder what gifts they'll have for us.
[Cal] There once was a farmer from Leeds
Who swallowed a bag full of seeds
translation.it: che di semi ingoiò una bustina.

translation.en: Cows do it all the time.

translation.it: Mio padre ha ucciso il bebè.

translation.en: He's gonna keep killing us over...
I'm not gonna let him hurt you.
translation.it: Non lascerò che ti faccia del male.

translation.en: But he's watching us right now.
translation.it: Ma ci sta guardando proprio adesso.

translation.en: I don't see. Your honey took my eye out.
translation.it: Non vedo. Il tuo amore mi ha tolto un occhio.
Gli occhi ingannano da queste parti.

translation.en: Too bad, kid. I liked ya.
Saw a seed of myself in there.
translation.it: Ho visto un seme di me in te.

translation.en: was to help you find redemption.
God knows you're the one who needed it the most.
translation.it: Dio sa che ne avevi più bisogno di tutti.
La redenzione è molto, molto facile.

translation.en: Sounds like he's really in trouble.
I've been trying to get to the road, -but I can't find it! -[sighs]
translation.it: Ho provato ad arrivare alla strada, ma non riesco a trovarla!

translation.en: Stay away from it. Stay away.
Don't listen to him. Get back in the car. You have to go.
translation.it: Non lo ascoltate. Tornate in macchina, andatevene.

translation.en: -Kid, where are your parents? -It doesn't matter. Please.
translation.it: - Dove sono i tuoi? - Non importa. Vi prego.

translation.en: -We just have to go. Get in the car. -Okay.
translation.it: - Dobbiamo andare. Su, in macchina. - Ok.

translation.en: -[Tobin] I can't find my way out! -What do we do?
translation.it: - Che facciamo? - Non riesco a uscire!

translation.en: I mean, it sure sounds like he's in trouble.
No. No! No, don't let him go in!
If he goes in, you'll go in and you'll never get out.
translation.it: Se lui entra, tu entri e non uscirai mai.

translation.en: He said he got this from Travis.
translation.it: Dice che glielo ha dato Travis.

translation.en: But right now, we have to go. Please.
translation.it: Ma ora dobbiamo andare. Per favore.

translation.en: You've gotta help me get out of here!
translation.it: Devi aiutarmi a uscire da qui!

translation.en: -That's back the way we came. -Yeah, I know.
I thought we said we were gonna go on.
What about that family in San Diego?
translation.it: E quella famiglia a San Diego?

translation.en: I have my own family now.
♪ By the way she wears her apron ♪ ♪ And the clothes she wore ♪
